entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023
